main event: A moving red light, the size of a dime, was observed descending continuously in Kelowna, B.C., Canada.
interesting points: The object descended instantaneously toward the ground.
The sighting was reported by numerous civilians at a drive-in movie theater.
The object was observed at an angle of 0 degrees azimuth, but the exact position was unknown.
The weather was cloudy and hazy, with temperatures ranging from 52°F to 69°F.
sighted object: A moving red light, the size of a dime
witnesses: Numerous civilians at a drive-in movie theater
photographs: No photographs included in the report
